ISSUE.TITLE: Remove _OldInternetExplorerWarning view
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. go to facebook and message anyone your website. I did www.CoJoCreates.com 2. You get the Orange https://www.cojocreates.com/Themes/CoJoCreates/Content/images/ie_warning.jpg ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/20989983/e8093c46-9ae4-4b33-89ab-de82fa0b543d) 3. I traced it back to _OldInternetExplorerWarning.cshtml 4. I removed the content of _OldInternetExplorerWarning.cshtml 5. Saved 6. Reposted the URL and it is working now Posted here: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/97220/facebook-link-is-orange#307111
